content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Cable Factory at position (2.5, 17.5)
Consists of the following entities:
– Cable factory input chest at Position(x=2.5, y=17.5)
– Burner inserter (fuelled with coal) at Position(x=1.5, y=17.5)
– Factory burner inserter at Position(x=3.5, y=17.5) 
– Auxiliary burner inserter at Position(x=2.5, y=16.5)
– Assembling machine-1 (producing copper-cable) at Position(x=1.5, y=19.5)
– Output chest at Position(x=1.5, y=21.5)

Substructure – Depot Belt Network at approximately Position (3.5, 15.5):
 • Wooden chest (serving as a belt depot) at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5)
 • Transport belt segment at Position(x=4.5, y=15.5)
 • Depot burner inserter at Position(x=3.5, y=14.5)

### Extraction System at position (-3.5, 27.5)
Consists of the following entity:
– Extraction system burner inserter with drop position at Position(x=-3.5, y=28.5)

### Electricity Generator at position (-0.5, 24.5)
Consists of the following entities:
– Steam engine (generator) at Position(x=-0.5, y=24.5)
– Boiler at Position(x=-5.5, y=24.0)
– Offshore pump at Position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)

### Smelting Setup at position (-3.0, 19.0)
Consists of the following paired entities:
• Stone furnace at Position(x=-3.0, y=19.0) with its associated wooden chest at Position(x=-4.5, y=18.5)
• Stone furnace at Position(x=-4.0, y=21.0) with its associated wooden chest at Position(x=-5.5, y=21.5)

### Science Lab
Consists of the following entity:
– Lab (lab_input: {'automation-science-pack': 17}, electrical_id=7106)
 (Position not specified)


ERROR TIPS

• Transport Belt Connection Errors
 – Multiple attempts failed with the message that transport belts cannot be connected directly to a Steam Engine target. Always ensure that an inserter (designed to input items into the Steam Engine) is placed and used as the connection target.

• Placement Distance Errors
 – Errors occurred when trying to place a wooden chest at (3.5, 15.5) because the player was too far (distance exceeded the maximum allowed). Move closer to the target position before placing an entity.

• Undefined Target Errors
 – A NameError was raised due to an undefined variable (target_chest). Double-check that all target entities are properly defined and referenced.

• Inventory Shortage Errors
 – An error indicating “No wooden_chest in inventory” was encountered when attempting placement. Verify that the required item is present in the inventory before attempting to place it.
